description: Positions and font sizes extracted from Sample_certificate.png using contour detection and font matching. Reference uses very large fonts (346pt, 170pt, 102pt).

name.description: Participant name field - centered at y=357.5px, font size 346pt (text height: 433px)

event.description: Event name field - centered at y=733.5px, font size 170pt (text height: 213px)

organiser.description: Organiser field - centered at y=1020px, font size 102pt (text height: 128px)

notes: Font sizes and positions extracted from reference certificate using computer vision. Reference uses Arial Bold at very large sizes (24-37% of image height for name field text). Template extracted from reference using CV inpainting.
